subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
Recreational Vehicles
lead_paragraph: Kyle Wilson, the Jets first round draft pick, has flown under the radar at times in his career, but his family has found unique ways to get schools and then teams to notice him.
snippet: Kyle Wilson, the Jets first round draft pick, has flown under the radar at times in his career, but his family has found unique ways to get schools and then teams to notice him.
